parameters.query:
-- Get ENHANCEMENT tasks from processing_queue (inklusive stuck tasks)
SELECT 
  pq.id as queue_id,
  pq.document_id,
  pq.task_type,
  pq.priority,
  d.original_name,
  d.file_type
FROM processing_queue pq
JOIN documents d ON pq.document_id = d.id
WHERE (pq.status = 'pending' 
   OR (pq.status = 'processing' AND pq.started_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes'))
  AND pq.task_type = 'enhance'
  AND d.status = 'completed' 
  AND pq.task_type = 'enhance'
  AND d.status = 'completed'
ORDER BY pq.priority DESC, pq.created_at ASC
LIMIT 1;

-- Der urspr√ºngliche Query aus deinem System
SELECT
    id AS chunk_id,
    document_id,
    content,
    content_type,
    chunk_index,
    page_number,
    (SELECT original_name FROM documents WHERE id = chunks.document_id) AS original_name,
    metadata
FROM chunks
WHERE status = 'raw';

-- Insert into enhanced_chunks table (NEW STRUCTURE)
INSERT INTO enhanced_chunks (
  document_id,
  original_chunk_id,
  chunk_index,
  enhanced_content,
  original_content,
  categories,
  extracted_metadata,
  detected_references,
  key_topics,
  content_type,
  page_number,
  enhancement_model,
  confidence_score,
  processing_time,
  quality_score,
  manual_review_needed
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.document_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.original_chunk_id }}'::uuid,
  {{ $json.chunk_index }},
  '{{ $json.enhanced_content }}',
  '{{ $json.original_content }}',
  '{{ $json.categories }}'::jsonb,
  '{{ $json.extracted_metadata }}'::jsonb,
  '{{ $json.detected_references }}'::jsonb,
  '{{ $json.key_topics }}'::jsonb,
  '{{ $json.content_type }}',
  {{ $json.page_number }},
  '{{ $json.enhancement_model }}',
  {{ $json.confidence_score }},
  {{ $json.processing_time }},
  {{ $json.quality_score }},
  {{ $json.manual_review_needed }}
)
RETURNING id, confidence_score, quality_score;

-- Check if all chunks for this document are enhanced
WITH document_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(c.id) as total_chunks,
    COUNT(ec.id) as enhanced_chunks
  FROM chunks c
  LEFT JOIN enhanced_chunks ec ON c.id = ec.original_chunk_id
  WHERE c.document_id = '{{ $('Combine Results1').item.json.document_id }}'::uuid
    AND c.status NOT IN ('archived', 'deleted')
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN enhanced_chunks >= total_chunks THEN 'completed'
    ELSE 'processing'
  END as task_status,
  total_chunks,
  enhanced_chunks
FROM document_stats;

-- Stuck enhance tasks zur√ºcksetzen (√§lter als 10 Minuten):
UPDATE processing_queue 
SET status = 'pending', started_at = NULL
WHERE task_type = 'enhance' 
  AND status = 'processing' 
  AND started_at < NOW() - INTERVAL '10 minutes';

-- Check das Ergebnis:
UPDATE processing_queue 
SET status = 'completed',
    completed_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $("Get Enhancement Tasks1").item.json.queue_id }}'::uuid
RETURNING id, status;

DELETE FROM chunks
WHERE id = '{{ $("Combine Results1").item.json.chunk_id }}'
  AND '{{ $("Combine Results1").item.json.manual_review_needed }}'::boolean = false
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM search_history 
    WHERE created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '2 minutes'
  )
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    -- Pr√ºfe aktive N8N Search Workflows
    SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.processlist 
    WHERE info LIKE '%search%' OR info LIKE '%SELECT%enhanced_chunks%'
  );
